short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take notes quickly from the browser with rich text, save images, videos, make lists or save your code with highlight functionality!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take notes quickly and easily in your browser! Copy and save text with rich formatting, save images, videos, code with highlight formatting and much more!

New Version released!
-New Themes: Customize the extension as you like! Click the settings button in the upper right corner and select the theme you like best.
-New JSON formatter: Copy-paste your unformatted Json in the editor, click on the { } button and then you will get the Json formatted in code block with highlights!

-Rich text editor, copy and paste texts and keep the original format.
-Autosave.
-Multi tab with up to 5 notes simultaneously.
-Save images and videos.
-Privacy: All your data is saved in your computer, not in the cloud.
-Resizable window and full screen mode
-Save code blocks with highlight formatting with the most common languages.
-Clean and pretty interface.
-Easy and very useful.
-Toolbar with many options to format your texts
